之.definition: (possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5]); him; her; it

之一.definition: one of (sth); one out of a multitude; one (third, quarter, percent etc)

之中.definition: inside; among; in the midst of (doing sth); during

之乎者也.definition: lit. 之[zhi1], 乎[hu1], 者[zhe3] and 也[ye3] (four grammatical particles of Classical Chinese) (idiom); fig. archaic expressions

之前.definition: before; prior to; ago; previously; beforehand

之後.definition: after; behind; (at the beginning of a sentence) afterwards; since then

之所以.definition: (after a noun N and before a predicate P) the reason why N P; Example: 我之所以討厭他|我之所以讨厌他[wo3 zhi1suo3yi3 tao3yan4 ta1] "the reason why I dislike him (is ...)"

之間.definition: (after a noun) between; among; amid; (used after certain bisyllabic words to form expressions indicating a short period of time, e.g. 彈指之間|弹指之间[tan2zhi3 zhi1 jian1])
